title: Derby’s Take: Fed’s Powell Is Unworried by China’s Digital Currency
body:
Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell this week echoed comments from some of his colleagues in saying that he doesn’t see China beating the U.S. central bank to market with a digital currency as a threat to the dollar’s role as the global reserve currency.
“I am less concerned that someone, that another country might have a digital currency first,” Mr. Powell said in a press conference Wednesday after the latest gathering of the monetary-policy-setting Federal Open Market Committee.
“The...
